alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 13 at 1:30PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of south central Wyoming, including the following areas, East Sweetwater County, Flaming Gorge and Rock Springs and Green River. * WHEN...Through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Thunderstorms each afternoon and evening through Sunday will have the potential to produce heavy rain. This would lead to localized flooding across portions of Sweetwater County through Sunday evening. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River
